record.id: field.name="calc.time.field" and file.name="AlertDef" and term="Field to use in calculating alert time" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: calc.time.field - AlertDef - Field to use in calculating alert time - - en
record.field.name: calc.time.field
record.file.name: AlertDef
record.term: Field to use in calculating alert time

brief.brief: The name of the Date/Time field in the Change request to add the interval field value to in order to determine the alert time.
If this field is empty (NULL), Change Management uses the current date/time to apply the alert interval.

detail.detail: The value stored in this field is the name of the field in the record that Service Manager uses as the basis for calculating the alert time.
